ResistanceFeature.Name: Ring of Poison Resistance
ResistanceFeature.Text: You have resistance to poison damage while wearing this ring, which is set with an amethyst.

MagicProperty.Name: Ring of Poison Resistance
MagicProperty.Description: You have resistance to poison damage while wearing this ring, which is set with an amethyst.
MagicProperty.Source: The Rise of Tiamat Online Supplement
